titleStmt.title: Mount Moriah, or A sermon preached at Carrick, by Mr. Riddale, August 5. 1679.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: lacks all after p. 16; stained, print show-through with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
